title: Riot Sales aren't on Sale :(
body: Topic Fisher Fizz, Frostfire annie, and sion not on sale :(

replies.body:
Hey Mar3thyu,

Sorry for the delay in this, we found a timing error and it caught up early this morning. I have extended the weekly by a day to compensate.
